properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued January 2 at 2:18AM PST until January 4 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Steep seas of 13 to 15 feet at 16 seconds will continue
through tonight, then south gales of 35 to 45 kt with gusts to
around 50 kt and very steep and wind driven seas of 20 to 24
feet will develop by Friday afternoon.

* WHERE...Small craft advisory conditions will impact all coastal
waters north of Cape Blanco, with strong gales and very steep
and hazardous seas impacting all areas Friday afternoon.

* WHEN...The Small Craft Advisory is in effect until 1 PM PST
Friday, followed by a Gale Warning from 1 PM to 10 PM PST
Friday. The Hazardous Seas Warning is in effect from 1 PM Friday
to 4 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid strong winds and very steep
seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST FRIDAY... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 10 PM PST FRIDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM FRIDAY TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY
